title: List of /v2/ Errors in JSON Text response?

comments.author: Glyph.7805
comments.body:
As always, you are very helpful Lawton Campbell!
Thank you!

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Nah x is the missing scope, e.g. “requires scope characters”. If there’s multiple missing scopes they’re comma-delimited.

comments.author: darthmaim.6017
comments.body: There are also {"text":“requires scope x”} and {"error":“not found”}.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: I don’t think there’s one, no. Off the top of my head, you’re missing the page out of range error, and then a handful of errors which indicate something is horribly horribly wrong (e.g., ErrUnknown).

comments.author: Glyph.7805
comments.body:
So far I have

{"text":"invalid key"}
{"text":"endpoint requires authentication"}
{"text":"ErrTimeout"}
{"text":"ErrInternal"}

Is there a full list of error codes? I didn’t see anything on the wiki.
